titles.title: I Was Glad When They Said Unto Me

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
I was glad when they said unto me
"Let's go up to the house of the Lord";
I was glad when they said unto me
"Let's go up to the house of the Lord".

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
My feet shall stand within Thy gates,
Within Thy gates, O Jerusalem;
My feet shall stand within Thy gates,
Within Thy gates, O Jerusalem.
